rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
甜味剂和甜味增强剂有望控制体重今年在意大利威尼斯举行的欧洲肥胖大会 (ECO)（5 月 12 日至 15 日）上公布的新研究表明，用低/无能量甜味产品替代含糖食品和饮料可以帮助控制体重至少一年成人快速减肥后，不会增加患 2 型糖尿病或心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Sweeteners-and-sweetness-enhancers-show-promise-for-weight-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Sweeteners-and-sweetness-enhancers-show-promise-for-weight-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10c655a8-8f6d-4c38-af31-492711df50fc Fri, 22 Mar 2024 15:59:53 -0400 Sweeteners and sweetness enhancers show promise for weight control
新的“融合位点”使药物开发更快、更有针对性许多重要的药物，例如抗生素和抗癌药物，都是从细菌的天然产物中提取的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-fusion-sites-enable-faster-and-more-targeted-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/New-fusion-sites-enable-faster-and-more-targeted-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba115af-1091-45ba-93b0-ffaeaa2fb115 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 15:54:40 -0400 New "fusion sites" enable faster and more targeted drug development
65 岁以上 AML 患者异基因造血干细胞移植后存活率上升在 2000 年至 2021 年间接受同种异体造血干细胞移植 (allo-HCT) 治疗急性髓系白血病 (AML) 的 65 岁以上患者中，随着时间的推移，无白血病生存率和总体生存率显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Rising-survival-rates-for-AML-病人-over-65-after-allogeneic-hematopoietic-stem-cell-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Rising-survival-rates-for-AML-病人-over-65-after-allogeneic-hematopoietic-stem-cell-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4cad7f8-384c-4408-a9b9-9c72b1afebab Fri, 22 Mar 2024 14:02:00 -0400 Rising survival rates for AML patients over 65 after allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant
锻炼对患有多种慢性病或风险的老年人有益且安全最近的一项研究表明，运动对于患有多种慢性病或危险因素的老年人来说也是有益且安全的。尽管患有慢性疾病，锻炼仍可以改善体质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Exercise-beneficial-and-safe-for-older-people-with-multiple-chronic-conditions-or-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Exercise-beneficial-and-safe-for-older-people-with-multiple-chronic-conditions-or-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af6a4326-b2d4-4d87-b9e6-ca411accdf25 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 13:29:00 -0400 Exercise beneficial and safe for older people with multiple chronic conditions or risks
怀孕后保持最佳的心脏健康可以降低心血管疾病的风险根据即将在美国心脏协会流行病学和预防|生活方式和心脏代谢科学会议上发表的初步研究，有不良妊娠并发症史的女性患心脏病的风险明显更高，但可以通过在怀孕后保持最佳心脏健康来降低风险2024 年会议，3 月 18 日至 21 日，在芝加哥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Maintaining-optimal-heart-health-after-pregnancy-can-mitigate-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Maintaining-optimal-heart-health-after-pregnancy-can-mitigate-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41f1c624-8123-4b89-b1a9-7e3c8329de3e Fri, 22 Mar 2024 13:23:42 -0400 Maintaining optimal heart health after pregnancy can mitigate cardiovascular disease risk
天然分子葫芦巴碱有助于改善肌肉健康和功能由瑞士雀巢研究中心和新加坡国立大学杨潞龄医学院（NUS Medicine）领导的一个研究联盟最近发现，存在于咖啡、葫芦巴和人体中的天然分子葫芦巴碱可以帮助改善肌肉健康和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Natural-molecule-trigonelline-can-help-to-improve-muscle-health-and-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Natural-molecule-trigonelline-can-help-to-improve-muscle-health-and-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7964449a-dd0e-4cd1-b8af-9e455dfd96ed Fri, 22 Mar 2024 13:17:00 -0400 Natural molecule trigonelline can help to improve muscle health and function
研究表明衰老与基因长度有关衰老可能与特定的“衰老基因”无关，而更多地与基因的长度有关。研究人员在 3 月 21 日发表在《遗传学趋势》杂志上的一篇评论文章中表示，许多与衰老相关的变化可能是由于长基因表达减少而发生的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Aging-linked-to-length-of-genes-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Aging-linked-to-length-of-genes-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45090fab-90ee-4cf2-bfdd-01412dc4296a Fri, 22 Mar 2024 12:53:48 -0400 Aging linked to length of genes, study suggests
科学家发现了四种控制间变性大细胞淋巴瘤身份的蛋白质圣裘德儿童研究医院和丹娜法伯癌症研究所的科学家合作发现了四种控制间变性大细胞淋巴瘤 (ALCL)（一种侵袭性癌症）特性的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Scientists-uncover-four- Proteins-that-govern-the-identity-of-anaplasty-large-cell-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Scientists-uncover-four- Proteins-that-govern-the-identity-of-anaplasty-large-cell-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f91bf4e6-d501-4b55-b3bc-fa3f4e0e354c Fri, 22 Mar 2024 12:43:12 -0400 Scientists uncover four proteins that govern the identity of anaplastic large cell lymphoma
米诺环素无法减缓干性年龄相关性黄斑变性患者的视力丧失根据国家眼科研究所 (NEI) 的一项 II 期临床研究，米诺环素是一种也能减轻炎症的抗生素，但未能减缓干性年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AMD) 患者的视力丧失或地理萎缩的扩大。隶属于美国国立卫生研究院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Minocycline-fails-to-slow-vision-loss-in-people-with-dry-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/Minocycline-fails-to-slow-vision-loss-in-people-with-dry-age-lated-maulous-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44181781-25a7-4f30-9b0d-055e3144d1ba Fri, 22 Mar 2024 12:25:58 -0400 Minocycline fails to slow vision loss in people with dry age-related macular degeneration
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究人员开发出有前途的针对致命类鼻疽细菌的疫苗在一项小鼠研究中，加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究人员测试了一种针对引起类鼻疽病的细菌的疫苗，发现它对这种疾病具有很强的保护作用。这种疾病在许多热带地区流行，每年在全球造成约 165,000 例病例，其中 89,000 人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/UCLA-researchers-develop-promising-vaccine-against-deadly-melioidosis-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240322/UCLA-researchers-develop-promising-vaccine-against-deadly-melioidosis-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9d61d1c-a380-45d2-ae14-02cf46b8ee13 Fri, 22 Mar 2024 12:19:31 -0400 UCLA researchers develop promising vaccine against deadly melioidosis bacterium
